description: The round payoff this round was 118. You, John chose to play option 2.Kate chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 118.
Option 2 can exploit an Option 1 opponent for higher individual payoff
Mutual cooperation (Option 1) maximizes shared payoff, while mutual defection (Option 2) reduces it.
The game's iterative nature allows for adaptive strategies based on revealed actions.
